title: Redesigning Online Social Studies Project-Based Pre-Service Teacher Education Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic secondary social studies curriculum concepts and foundational digital literacy
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to develop social studies curriculum design and implementation skills in online environments. Emphasizing PBL-based collaborative learning in BYOD settings

learning_goals: Learners can create online social studies project design documents by applying the principle of constructivist alignment
Learners perform collaborative problem-solving processes in PBL environments at over 80% proficiency using digital tools
Learners can develop and apply formative assessment tools to diagnose learner performance at three or more levels
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
